targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    count(metric_values[indexOf(metric_names, 'impulse')]) * 30 / 1000 AS "kW"
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND instance = 'I100'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(dt), 120) * 120) * 1000 as t,     count(metric_values[indexOf(metric_names, 'impulse')]) * 30 / 1000 AS "kW" FROM default.measurements WHERE     dt >= toDateTime(1586193314)     AND instance = 'I100' GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    count(metric_values[indexOf(metric_names, 'impulse')]) / 1000 AS "kW"
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND instance = 'I100'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(dt), 3600) * 3600) * 1000 as t,     count(metric_values[indexOf(metric_names, 'impulse')]) / 1000 AS "kW" FROM default.measurements WHERE     dt >= toDateTime(1586193465)     AND instance = 'I100' GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    toUInt32(toStartOfDay(dt)) * 1000 as t,
    count(metric_values[indexOf(metric_names, 'impulse')]) / 1000 AS "kWh"
FROM $table
WHERE
    dt > now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY
    AND instance = 'I100'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    toUInt32(toStartOfDay(dt)) * 1000 as t,
    count(metric_values[indexOf(metric_names, 'impulse')]) / 1000 AS "kWh"
FROM default.measurements
WHERE
    dt > now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY
    AND instance = 'I100'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(metric_values[indexOf(metric_names, 'temperature')]) AS "Living room (S205)"
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND instance = 'S205'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(dt), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t,
    avg(metric_values[indexOf(metric_names, 'temperature')]) AS "Living room (S205)"
FROM default.measurements
WHERE
    dt >= toDateTime(1677960926) AND dt <= toDateTime(1678047326)
    AND instance = 'S205'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

    dt >= toDateTime(1677963174) AND dt <= toDateTime(1678049574)
    AND instance = 'S222'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(metric_values[indexOf(metric_names, 'pressure')]) AS "Car (S215)"

GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
